scripts.start: node -e "const http = require('http'); const server = http.createServer((req, res) => { res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json'); res.end(JSON.stringify({message: 'Line21 CMS Server Running!', port: process.env.PORT, host: process.env.HOST, timestamp: new Date().toISOString()})); }); server.listen(process.env.PORT || 10000, process.env.HOST || '0.0.0.0', () => console.log('âœ… Server running on port', process.env.PORT || 10000));"
scripts.start:debug: echo 'Starting Strapi on port:' $PORT && echo 'Host:' $HOST && strapi start
scripts.start:test: echo 'NODE_ENV:' $NODE_ENV && echo 'PORT:' $PORT && echo 'HOST:' $HOST && echo 'Starting Strapi...' && timeout 30 strapi start || echo 'Strapi failed to start or timed out'
